intro.title:
Science
is powerful
intro.body: In a changing world, we need to come together to celebrate the power of interational collaboration. Add your voice to keep science open.

signup.title: Take action! Join us to stay informed
signup.footer: We'll send you well-timed news and ideas for how you can get involved. We won't share your email with anyone else.

mission.title:
Our
mission
mission.body:
We come from different places, from different cultures and backgrounds. Science brings us together.

Together we mix logic with intuition.
Together we push the boundaries of what’s possible.
Together we can solve colossal problems – and microscopic ones too.
Together we improve lives.

But divided we can’t, so more than ever, science needs us to join together.

Together science can.
